divs: Sighting DetailsWe was 5 persons. We was at beach and we saw 3 luminous object at the sky. His disposition was on triangle. One of this 3 objects did a very violent, fast and abstract movements in the sky. There was no pattern. We were talking about what we saw, and we all saw the same thing. I saw a lot of meteorites, i can recognize it, but these 3 objects were not meteorites. Greetings from Spain.
Summary: Three objects at the sky with violent, fast and abstract movements.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Torrevieja
This sighting has never been favorited.
